Text: Pachypodium is a genus of succulent spine-bearing trees and shrubs, native to Madagascar and Africa.
Triplets:<Pachypodium
1:
--------------------
Text: Pachypodium:  It belongs to the dogbane family, Apocynaceae.
Triplets:<Pachypodium
2:
--------------------
<Text: Pachypodium:  "Pachypodium" comes from a Latin form from Greek "pachus" (thick) and "podion" (foot) (or Gk podos, root form of pous, foot), hence meaning "thick-footed".>
